Class Person

java.lang.Object
  Person

public class Person
extends Object

Set up Person Object and Restore Vital Information to calculate various health and fitness calucations

Version:
1.0 Last Modified: September 14, 2014 - Created By Ben Maciorowski

Constructor Detail

Person

public Person()
Constructor for objects of class Person

Person

public Person(String fullName,
              double weight,
              int age,
              double height,
              String gender,
              double activityLevel)
Takes in vital parameters for the person object

Parameters:
fullName - the name of the individual
weight - the individual's weight
height - the individual's height
age - the individual's age
weight - the individual's gender 0=male,1=female,2=gender neutral
activityLevel - the activity level of the individual represented by a double
